user_persona: A farmer looking to stay updated on the latest agricultural trends.
user_goal: Browse and read the latest agricultural news articles.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting News Section
narrative_steps.description: Maria navigates to the news section of the agriculture website to find updates.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the news section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of news articles is displayed in a grid format with titles, summaries, and thumbnails.

narrative_steps.title: Reading an Article
narrative_steps.description: Maria sees an interesting article titled 'New Crop Technologies' and clicks on it to read more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a news card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The full article page loads, showing detailed content related to the selected news.

narrative_steps.title: Loading More Articles
narrative_steps.description: After reading, Maria scrolls down to discover more articles.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the news list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional articles are automatically loaded, extending the list.

user_persona: A buyer interested in purchasing fresh produce directly from farms.
user_goal: View detailed information about farm products available for purchase.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Products
narrative_steps.description: James visits the products page to explore what's currently available.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the products section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A responsive grid of product cards is displayed, each showing name, type, price, and availability status.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Product Details
narrative_steps.description: He finds organic tomatoes and clicks on the card to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a product card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal or dedicated page opens with detailed information about the selected product.

narrative_steps.title: Quick Actions
narrative_steps.description: While browsing other products, he hovers over a card for carrots to see quick options.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a product card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Quick action buttons like 'Add to Favorites' appear on the card.

user_persona: An agronomist planning fieldwork based on weather conditions.
user_goal: Check the weather forecast for different agricultural regions.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Weather Forecasts
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Lee goes to the weather section to review forecasts for upcoming field visits.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the weather forecast section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Weather cards grouped by location are displayed with min/max temperatures, conditions, and humidity levels.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Location
narrative_steps.description: She selects the 'North Region' from the map to get localized data.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a location pin on the map.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The weather forecast panel updates to show data specific to the North Region.

narrative_steps.title: Highlighting Data
narrative_steps.description: As she reviews, Dr. Lee hovers over a weather card for tomorrow’s forecast.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a weather card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The corresponding entry on the map is highlighted for better correlation.

requirement_tested: Search functionality for news, products, and weather
user_persona: A researcher gathering data across multiple agricultural topics.
user_goal: Use the search bar to quickly locate specific news, products, or weather information.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: Alex remembers reading something about irrigation techniques and uses the search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Autocomplete suggestions appear below the search input.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Query
narrative_steps.description: He types 'irrigation' and presses Enter to submit his query.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'irrigation' and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a results page showing matches from news, products, and weather sections.

user_persona: A policy analyst focusing on agricultural regulations.
user_goal: Filter news articles to focus only on policy-related updates.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Category Filter
narrative_steps.description: Sarah wants to narrow down her news feed to 'Policy Changes' only.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Policy Changes' category tag.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only news articles categorized under 'Policy Changes' are displayed, with the tag highlighted.

requirement_tested: Filter options for farm product types
user_persona: A chef sourcing ingredients for a restaurant menu.
user_goal: Find only vegetable products available for purchase.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering by Product Type
narrative_steps.description: Chef Miguel uses the filter dropdown to view only vegetables.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Vegetables' from the 'Filter by Type' dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The product grid updates to show only vegetable-type items.

user_persona: A regional coordinator managing multiple farming sites.
user_goal: Check weather forecasts specifically for the East Plains region.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Region Filter
narrative_steps.description: Tommy wants to monitor weather conditions in the East Plains.
narrative_steps.action: Choose 'East Plains' from the location filter dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Weather forecast panel refreshes to display data specific to the East Plains area.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with light cyan background
user_persona: A frequent mobile user accessing the site on various devices.
user_goal: Access the website seamlessly on desktop and mobile with consistent visuals.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Site on Desktop
narrative_steps.description: Emily opens the website on her laptop to check today’s news.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage on a desktop browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Entire page background is rendered in light cyan (#E0FFFF) with proper responsiveness.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Mobile View
narrative_steps.description: Later, she accesses the same site on her phone while commuting.
narrative_steps.action: Resize viewport or switch to mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively, maintaining the light cyan background and readable content.

user_persona: A designer evaluating UI consistency across platforms.
user_goal: Verify that all interactive elements follow the cadet blue theme.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Buttons
narrative_steps.description: Jordan notices the buttons on the homepage and checks their styling.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a primary button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button maintains cadet blue color (#5F9EA0) and gains subtle shadow or darkening effect.

requirement_tested: Frontend fetching data from backend APIs
user_persona: A developer verifying dynamic data integration.
user_goal: Confirm that frontend components fetch real-time data instead of using mocks.

narrative_steps.title: Loading News Dynamically
narrative_steps.description: Developer Sam inspects network activity when loading the news section.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser DevTools Network tab and navigate to news section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: HTTP GET request made to /api/news endpoint; no hardcoded data found in source code.

requirement_tested: Backend connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A DevOps engineer validating backend setup.
user_goal: Ensure backend connects securely to PostgreSQL with correct configurations.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: DevOps engineer Alice checks if backend service initializes properly with given DB settings.
narrative_steps.action: Start backend server locally with environment variables set.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server logs confirm successful connection to PostgreSQL at localhost:5432 using myappuser credentials.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json with npm run install:all script
user_persona: A new contributor setting up the project locally.
user_goal: Install dependencies for both frontend and backend efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Running Unified Install Command
narrative_steps.description: Bob clones the repo and runs the unified installation command.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json with npm run dev script
user_persona: A developer starting local development servers.
user_goal: Launch both frontend and backend development environments together.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Developer Tina begins working by starting both application layers.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run dev` from the root folder.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers start concurrently, accessible via their respective ports.

requirement_tested: Database schema for storing news articles
user_persona: A database administrator reviewing data models.
user_goal: Validate that news articles are stored according to defined schema.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Table Structure
narrative_steps.description: DBA Raj queries the database to verify the structure of news_articles table.
narrative_steps.action: Connect to PostgreSQL and run DESCRIBE or equivalent on news_articles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table exists with columns: id, title, summary, content, category, published_at, image_url matching schema definition.

requirement_tested: Database schema for storing farm product data
user_persona: A data analyst ensuring accurate product tracking.
user_goal: Confirm that farm product records match the defined database schema.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Product Table
narrative_steps.description: Analyst Kim checks how farm product data is structured in the database.
narrative_steps.action: Query the farm_products table schema.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Schema matches CREATE TABLE statement with fields: id, name, type, description, price, image_url, availability_status.

requirement_tested: Database schema for storing weather forecast information
user_persona: A meteorologist collaborating on agricultural forecasting tools.
user_goal: Ensure weather data storage supports temporal and spatial analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Forecast Schema
narrative_steps.description: Meteorologist Paul verifies that weather data is stored appropriately for analysis.
narrative_steps.action: Examine the weather_forecasts table structure.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table has composite key (location_id, forecast_date) and includes fields: location_name, temperature_min/max, condition, humidity, wind_speed.
